languages.text: "Я устранил{mf||а} проблему. Ни Идира, ни призрак покойной Теодоры нас больше не побеспокоят. Распорядитесь, чтобы на нижней палубе убрали тела".

traits.locale_text: Я устранил{mf||а} проблему. Ни Идира, ни призрак покойной Теодоры нас больше не побеспокоят. Распорядитесь, чтобы на нижней палубе убрали тела.

languages.text: "I eliminated the problem. Neither Idira nor the ghost of the departed Theodora will trouble us again. See to it that the bodies on the lower deck are disposed of."
languages.original_text: "Я устранил{mf||а} проблему. Ни Идира, ни призрак покойной Теодоры нас больше не побеспокоят. Распорядитесь, чтобы на нижней палубе убрали тела".

traits.locale_text: "I eliminated the problem. Neither Idira nor the ghost of the departed Theodora will trouble us again. See to it that the bodies on the lower deck are disposed of."
"I eliminated the problem. Neither Idira nor the ghost of the departed Theodora will trouble us again. See to it that the bodies on the lower deck are disposed of."
"I eliminated the problem. Neither Idira nor the ghost of the departed Theodora will trouble us again. See to it that the bodies on the lower deck are disposed of."
"I eliminated the problem. Neither Idira nor the ghost of the departed Theodora will trouble us again. See to it that the bodies on the lower deck are disposed of."

languages.text: “我已经解决了这个问题。无论是伊迪拉，还是逝世的西奥多拉的幽灵，都不会再找我们的麻烦了。记得派人去处理下层甲板的尸体。”
languages.original_text: "I eliminated the problem. Neither Idira nor the ghost of the departed Theodora will trouble us again. See to it that the bodies on the lower deck are disposed of."

traits.locale_text: “我已经解决了这个问题。无论是伊迪拉，还是逝世的西奥多拉的幽灵，都不会再找我们的麻烦了。记得派人去处理下层甲板的尸体。”

languages.text: «He eliminado la raíz del problema. Ni Idira ni el fantasma de la fallecida Theodora volverán a molestarnos. Encárguese de los cuerpos de la cubierta inferior».
languages.original_text: "I eliminated the problem. Neither Idira nor the ghost of the departed Theodora will trouble us again. See to it that the bodies on the lower deck are disposed of."

traits.locale_text: «He eliminado la raíz del problema. Ni Idira ni el fantasma de la fallecida Theodora volverán a molestarnos. Encárguese de los cuerpos de la cubierta inferior».

languages.text: 「問題は解決した。イディラも、亡くなったシオドーラの亡霊も、もう{mf|俺|私}たちを悩ませることはない。下層デッキの死体の処理を頼む」
languages.original_text: "I eliminated the problem. Neither Idira nor the ghost of the departed Theodora will trouble us again. See to it that the bodies on the lower deck are disposed of."

traits.locale_text: 「問題は解決した。イディラも、亡くなったシオドーラの亡霊も、もう{mf|俺|私}たちを悩ませることはない。下層デッキの死体の処理を頼む」

languages.text: "Ich schaffe das Problem aus der Welt. Weder Idira, noch der Geist der verstorbenen Theodora wird uns noch einmal Ärger machen. Seht zu, dass die Leichen auf dem Unterdeck entsorgt werden."
languages.original_text: "I eliminated the problem. Neither Idira nor the ghost of the departed Theodora will trouble us again. See to it that the bodies on the lower deck are disposed of."

traits.locale_text: "Ich schaffe das Problem aus der Welt. Weder Idira, noch der Geist der verstorbenen Theodora wird uns noch einmal Ärger machen. Seht zu, dass die Leichen auf dem Unterdeck entsorgt werden."

languages.text: « Problème réglé. Ni Idira ni le fantôme de la défunte Théodora ne viendront plus nous importuner. Veillez à ce que les corps restés sur le pont inférieur soient évacués. »
languages.original_text: "I eliminated the problem. Neither Idira nor the ghost of the departed Theodora will trouble us again. See to it that the bodies on the lower deck are disposed of."

traits.locale_text: « Problème réglé. Ni Idira ni le fantôme de la défunte Théodora ne viendront plus nous importuner. Veillez à ce que les corps restés sur le pont inférieur soient évacués. »

languages.text: "Sorunu ortadan kaldırdım. İdira ve rahmetli Theodora'nın hayaleti bizi artık rahatsız etmeyecek. Alt güvertedeki cesetlerden kurtulun."
languages.original_text: "I eliminated the problem. Neither Idira nor the ghost of the departed Theodora will trouble us again. See to it that the bodies on the lower deck are disposed of."

traits.locale_text: "Sorunu ortadan kaldırdım. İdira ve rahmetli Theodora'nın hayaleti bizi artık rahatsız etmeyecek. Alt güvertedeki cesetlerden kurtulun."
